scripts.test:e2e: npm run compile && npm run build -w syncwatch-extension && npm run build -w syncwatch-server && npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e-ci: CI=true npm run compile && npm run build -w syncwatch-extension && npm run build -w syncwatch-server && npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e-ui: npm run compile && npm run build && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e-update-snapshots: npm run compile && npm run build && npx playwright test --update-snapshots
